mapper.select: select order_num, user_num, receiver, base_addr, detail_addr, receiver_tel, request, payment_type, order_date, delivery_num, delivery_status from orders order by order_num
select order_num, user_num, receiver, base_addr, detail_addr, receiver_tel, request, payment_type, order_date, delivery_num, delivery_status from orders where user_num=#{userNum} order by order_num

SELECT DISTINCT order_num, user_num, receiver, base_addr, detail_addr, receiver_tel, request, payment_type, order_date, delivery_num, delivery_status FROM orders JOIN order_books USING ( order_num ) JOIN books USING ( isbn ) WHERE book_title LIKE '%'||#{words}||'%' OR order_num LIKE '%'||#{words}||'%' order by order_num
select last_number from user_sequences where sequence_name = 'ORDERNO_SEQ'

select order_num, user_num, receiver, base_addr, detail_addr, receiver_tel, request, payment_type, order_date, delivery_num, delivery_status from orders where delivery_status=#{deliveryStatus} order by order_num
mapper.insert: insert into orders(order_num, user_num, receiver, base_addr, detail_addr, receiver_tel, request, payment_type, order_date, delivery_status) values(orderno_seq.nextval, #{userNum}, #{receiver}, #{baseAddr}, #{detailAddr}, #{receiverTel}, #{request}, #{paymentType}, sysdate, #{deliveryStatus})
